Package org.wildfly.plugin.deployment

Class RedeployMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.wildfly.plugin.common.AbstractServerConnection
org.wildfly.plugin.deployment.RedeployMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
RedeployOnlyMojo
@Mojo(name="redeploy", requiresDependencyResolution=RUNTIME, threadSafe=true) @Execute(phase=PACKAGE) public class RedeployMojo extends AbstractServerConnection
Redeploys the application to the WildFly Application Server.
Author:
James R. Perkins
